command.char: Shows data for an unit, like bases, growths, skills, etc.
command.unit: Shows data for an unit, like bases, growths, skills, etc.
command.art: Shows the portrait/attack/special/damage art for a hero and their artist.
command.aether: Bonus Heroes/Structures and time left for the current Aether Raids season.
command.arena: Bonus Heroes and time left for the current Arena season.
command.bat: Stats, endurance, gambit and min. authority for a battalion.
command.blood: Growth bonuses and legendary weapon of a Holy Blood.
command.learn: Shows abilities learned by an unit via authority, budding talent, etc.
command.set: Shows what classes an unit can reclass to.
command.info: Recruitment requirements, promotion requirements and prf weapons for an unit.
command.rank: Shows which abilities can be learned via skills (aka Weapon Ranks)
command.quotes: Hero dialogue for their status page, castle hall, etc.
command.artist: Shows all heroes draw by an artist.
command.va: Shows all heroes voice by an voice actor.
command.ring: Data for Emblem or Bond rings.
command.card: Card Art. Card codes can also be used.

args.class: Reclasses the unit to another class.
args.mod:
Applies boon/banes. Can also be set with `+boon -bane`
`+atk -def` <- *Must be in that order!*
args.offspring: Changes the class that the unit promoted from a offspring seal.
args.support: Shows support effects between two characters.
args.resplendent: Applies resplendent bonuses if the unit has an alt outfit.
args.bonus: Applies the +4 from being a bonus unit in a game mode.
args.parent: Autolevels the parents to that level.
args.rb: Applies the effects of a rainbow potion.
args.drop: Applies the effects of a growth drop.
args.talent: Sets the avatar talent for class inheritance.
args.wpn: Applies stats granted by a weapon.
args.mt: Applies additional might to a weapon via forging.
args.hit: Applies additional hit to a weapon via forging.
args.crit: Applies additional crit to a weapon via forging.
args.wt: Applies additional weight to a weapon via forging.
args.max: Applies maximum merges and dragonflowers, also applies resplendent if unit has one.
args.past: Applies fortune bonuses for the avatar's Past.
args.future: Applies fortune bonuses for the avatar's Future.
args.present: Applies fortune bonuses for the avatar's Present.
args.boon: Sets a boon/asset stat. Also needs a bane/flaw.
args.bane: Sets a bane/flaw stat. Also needs a boon/asset.
args.modifiers: Applies modifiers that can change the unit's stat calculation.
args.ring: Equip a Emblem ring or a Bond ring.
args.starsphere: Applies starsphere bonuses to the growths
args.fixed: Adjust averages for fixed growths mode.
args.untransform: To use untransformed stasts when equipping items or comparing.

fe5.class: Reclasses the unit to another class. Not the same stat changes as promoting!

fe7.class: Reclasses the unit to another class. Not the same stat changes as promoting!

fe8.class: Reclasses the unit to another class. Not the same stat changes as promoting!

fe9.class: Reclasses the unit to another class. Not the same stat changes as promoting!

fe10.class: Reclasses the unit to another class. Not the same stat changes as promoting!

bsfe.class: Reclasses the unit to another class. Not the same stat changes as promoting!

fe3.class: Reclasses the unit to another class. Not the same stat changes as promoting!

b2.class: Reclasses the unit to another class. Not the same stat changes as promoting!

feh.skill: Shows what a skill does and which heroes can learn it.

fe15.skill: Shows data for combat arts or passive skills.

fe14.char: Shows data for an unit, like bases, growths, skills, etc.

fe3.char:
Shows data for an unit, like bases, growths, skills, etc.
**If you want unit data for a specific book, please use instead:
o!b1 - Book 1
o!b2 - Book 2**

feh.art: Shows the portrait/attack/special/damage art for a hero and their artist.
